Message.Msg: why shouldn't I dream of some GOP guy coming to the resue? Someone needs to rescue the party from the establishment RINOs. So far there is no one out there. So we speculate and dream. So?
update!

To the contrary. Carson is willing to say things that GOP pols wouldn't touch. That's why his speech right in front of Obama received such traction. He put forth in less than a minute an idea that is full of common sense. That's why the pols won't touch it. I have no idea whether politics is in his future. He said he is retiring in June and seems to have left the door open to it.

Message.Title: CA businesses to kiss off state
Message.Msg: high interest in CA businesses relocating to TX. Makes me laugh! Greater Austin Chamber of Commerce officials, who sent a representative on Gov. Rick Perry’s recent California recruiting trip, report a spike in Golden State companies inquiring about relocating to Central Texas. Californians seem responsive to Texas’ low tax message, especially since the most recent state election in November, when income and sales taxes increases were approved by California’s voters in a measure called Proposition 30. “We have had a spike of double or triple the amount of normal (business relocation) activity since the November election in California,” said Dave Porter, senior vice president for economic development at the Greater Austin Chamber of Commerce.

Topic.Title: CA businesses to kiss off state

Message.Msg: Many companies and individuals are moving to Arizona also. I did last year but not for tax reasons. Arizona has problems too. At least they don't have a governor like "Moonbeam" or a legislature full of fruitcakes.

Topic.Title: CA businesses to kiss off state

Message.Msg: Like I said they're running the people out who keep the state solvent. It's not just business but individuals fed up with the liberal agenda. I have friends who retired a few years ago and they moved to Texas. They love it. Good food, good neighbors and everyone carries a gun, a conservative paradise. There are areas in Calif that are not safe anymore, that includes upscale neighborhoods where burgleries have gone up, the cops are outgunned and a backlog of criminal cases to be tried in court which are costing millions, a liberals paradise. The Dems are running on empty now, are they in for a reality check.
Thanks for sharing this report

Topic.Title: CA businesses to kiss off state

Message.Msg: A double edge sword, Annie. As CA businesses leave the state (e.g., to TX) they will take withg them CA residents who most likely voted for Obama. As they move to TX it is very possible that in time such voters may change the political landscape there. It happened it Vermont and Montana. TX would be more of a challenge for them though.
